OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

EnoughCurrencyCheck.label: Enough Currency Check
EnoughCurrencyCheck.tooltip: Check if the starting user has more points than the highest possible lost

Blacklist.label: Blacklisted User
Blacklist.tooltip: List Users that can not take the bomb. Seperated with comma.

RandomPassCommands.label: Use randomized pass commands
RandomPassCommands.tooltip: Enable randomized pass commands from the given list to prevent copy paste of the players

PassCommandsList.label: Commands to pass the bomb
PassCommandsList.tooltip: The commands to pass the bomb seperated by comma. Must be min. 2 commands and it will choose one of it random each time.

EnableWrongCommandResponse.label: Enable wrong command response
EnableWrongCommandResponse.tooltip: Enable the response if the player enter one of the given commands but not the right command

ActiveGameButWrongCommand.value: $username the game is currently active but you used the wrong random command ($command) to pass it!
ActiveGameButWrongCommand.label: Wrong command response
ActiveGameButWrongCommand.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the wrong command is entered while the game is active. 
 $username 
 $command

Min.label: Min value
Min.tooltip: Min value - a value in between will be taken. It is also possible to set min and max to the same value.

Max.label: Max value
Max.tooltip: Max value - a value in between will be taken. It is also possible to set min and max to the same value.

Timeout.label: Timeout users who fail
Timeout.tooltip: If enabled viewers that are holding the bomb when it explodes will get timed out. Only available for Twitch

ActiveGameTime.label: Game time (seconds)
ActiveGameTime.tooltip: Game time till the bomb explodes (in seconds). Will be randomed from 90% to 110%

OnCooldown.value: $username the command is still on cooldown for $cooldown seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $username 
 $cooldown

NotEnoughResponse.value: $username you don´t have enough $currency to attempt this! You will need atleast $points $currency.
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points 
 $username 
 $currency 
 $points

PermissionResponse.value: $username -> only $permission ($permissioninfo) and higher can use this command
PermissionResponse.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
 $username 
 $permission 
 $permissioninfo

ActiveGameButNotBombHolderResponse.value: $username the game is currently active but you are not the bomb owner
ActiveGameButNotBombHolderResponse.label: Active Game Response
ActiveGameButNotBombHolderResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when a game is active. 
 $username

NoTargetFoundResponse.value: $username unfortunately there is no valid target in the viewerlist :(
NoTargetFoundResponse.label: No Target Found Response
NoTargetFoundResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when no target is found. 
 $username

StartResponse.value: $username you started the bomb game and gave it to $targetname. Use $command to pass it to the next person!
StartResponse.label: Game Starting Response
StartResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the game is starting. 
 $username 
 $targetname 
 $command

PassResponse.value: $username you gave the bomb to $targetname. Use $command to pass it to the next person!
PassResponse.label: Pass Bomb to another player Response
PassResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when a game is active. 
 $username 
 $targetname 
 $command

TargetLostNotEnough.value: The bomb exploded and $loser had only $pointslost $currency, so he lost everything. $winner was the last person to pass the bomb and won $pointswon $currency
TargetLostNotEnough.label: Target Lost and had not enough points
TargetLostNotEnough.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the bomb explodes and the loser had not enough points. 
 $winner 
 $loser 
 $pointswon 
 $pointslost 
 $currency

TargetLost.value: The bomb exploded and $loser lost $pointslost $currency. $winner was the last person to pass the bomb and won $pointswon $currency
TargetLost.label: Target Lost
TargetLost.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the bomb explodes. 
 $winner 
 $loser 
 $pointswon 
 $pointslost 
 $currency

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
